text: Of 22/25 patients post-treatment SCC-Ag data were available: 17/22 $( 7 7 \% )$ had elevated SCC-Ag during follow-up.A raised SCC-Ag was observed before the clinical manifestation of recurrence in $4 3 \%$ of cases whereas in $1 5 \%$ of cases, the clinical recurrence preceded the SCC-Ag rise.
